text_block_list.text: Peeeew... boom!

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: So beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
That was so beautiful! I can't believe<n>they have fireworks
and festivals at<n>night here! Bubblyland sure is<n>something
else!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe! ♪ After dinner, how about<n>we see who's better at
candy<n>cutting?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ooh, that sounds fun! But prepare to<n>lose!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah! Hey, you three! I found a stall that<n>sells shaved ice!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Yaaay! Come on, Sweep! Let's go<n>get some strawberry
shaved ice!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hmph! No thanks!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Oh, dear me. Sweep Pea must still be<n>in shock.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: I bet she didn't expect Scarlet to go<n>home.
A little earlier...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
All right! Time't have as much fun as<n>we can! Scarlet, you
should hang out<n>with us before going back!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sorry, but I have to decline.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Sorry. It's not that I don't believe<n>what you or Maruzen
said.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
But for me, I think the only way I can<n>get better is by
running. It's what I've<n>always done. Furthermore...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I have to take first place in the next<n>race, no matter what.
...I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
We understand. No need to apologize!<n>Feel free to talk to me
if you're ever<n>troubled, okay? I'll help you out<n>whenever
or wherever you—
There you are! Scarlet!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: I was wondering where you went! I<n>told you to follow me!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ack! I forgot about you! Hey, wait,what are you talking about?!You're the one who ran off in thefirst place!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me what to do! Bleeeh!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Grr! You little...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Never mind. I can't keepwasting time here. Come on, let'shurry home, Sweep!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't worry about Sweep Pea.<n>She'll be fine with me.
Go ahead and<n>head back first so you can get your<n>training
in! ♪

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: B-but...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
I did just say I'd be willing to help<n>you whenever and
wherever,<n>remember? ♪

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Oh... Thank you very much... Then I<n>guess, um... I'll see you
back at<n>school.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Wait, where are you going?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Back to the academy. I have to train...<n>I'll see you around,
Sweep.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hmph... What's with her looking all<n>serious like that?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Was it really okay for us to just let<n>her go home? I hope
she's not<n>pushing herself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Scarlet has her own way of thinking.<n>It would be wrong to
force her to stay,<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well, I am a little worried about her.<n>But there are times
when one simply<n>wants some time alone to think.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah... You're right...

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Ugh, what is up with her?Scarlet's such a dummy, acting allhigh and mighty like that!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! I can't handle it anymore! I'll<n>be right back!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? Sweep?!
